meanings.definition: A bin or storage container for coal.
meanings.sent1: The coalbin in the basement is full of black coal.
meanings.sent2: The coalbin outside the house keeps the coal dry and organized.
meanings.sent3: When the coalbin sneezed, coal dust flew everywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a coalbin of memories, each one carefully stored.
meanings.sent5: The coalbin stood like a sentinel, guarding its precious coal.

meanings.definition: To store or keep coal in a bin.
meanings.sent1: We need to coalbin the extra coal before it gets wet.
meanings.sent2: He will coalbin the new shipment of coal in the storage area.
meanings.sent3: She decided to coalbin the coal in a rainbow pattern, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The memories coalbinned in his mind, waiting to be recalled.
meanings.sent5: The workers coalbinned the coal with precision, ensuring no spillage.
